data.name: Ghostrunner - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Ghostrunner is a hardcore FPP game packed with lightning-fast action, set in a grim, cyberpunk megastructure. Climb Dharma Tower, humanity’s last shelter, after a world-ending cataclysm. Make your way up from the bottom to the top, confront the tyrannical Keymaster, and take your revenge.

Immerse yourself in Ghostrunner with the Original Soundtrack. The following items are included in the Soundtrack:

Original Soundtrack:
-20 songs created by Daniel Deluxe

data.short_description: Ghostrunner is a hardcore FPP game packed with lightning-fast action, set in a grim, cyberpunk megastructure. Climb Dharma Tower, humanity’s last shelter, after a world-ending cataclysm. Make your way up from the bottom to the top, confront the tyrannical Keymaster, and take your revenge.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 22 GB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 8 GB available space
